name: gh-devops-mcp
description: GitHub DevOps MCP Server â€” CI/CD, Deployments, Releases, Security and more for AI agents

scripts.copy-to-extension: mkdir -p extension/mcp-server && cp -r dist/* extension/mcp-server/ && cp -r node_modules extension/mcp-server/ && cp node_modules/libsodium/dist/modules-esm/libsodium.mjs extension/mcp-server/node_modules/libsodium-wrappers/dist/modules-esm/libsodium.mjs && echo '{"type":"module"}' > extension/mcp-server/package.json
